pkgmetadata.longdescription: Cusp-Catastrophe Model Fitting Using Maximum Likelihood // Cobb's maximum likelihood method for cusp-catastrophe modeling (Grasman, van der Maas, and Wagenmakers (2009) doi:10.18637/jss.v032.i08; Cobb (1981), Behavioral Science, 26(1), 75-78). Includes a cusp() function for model fitting, and several utility functions for plotting, and for comparing the model to linear regression and logistic curve models.
